effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.

short_effect.sun_moon: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
